bibl.title: Antinoopolis February / March 2013. Work in the So-Called Chiostro at the Church beside the Assumed Eastern Gate.
bibl.note: Project of ""The archaeological map of Antinoupolis"". - Work in the so-called chiostro: the identification as a new church. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Peter Grossmann, Antinoopolis February / March 2013. Work in the So-Called Chiostro at the Church beside the Assumed Eastern Gate.
Raccolta di scritti dedicati a Orsolina Montevecchi. IV = Aegyptus 91 (2011 [2014]) pp. 127-140, 7 pll.; 330.
Project of ""The archaeological map of Antinoupolis"". - Work in the so-called chiostro: the identification as a new church. - Avec résumé en anglais.
